Global Functions  

addTime (secs)

objtime.t[392]

Add a certain number of seconds to the current action time. [OBJTIME EXTENSION]

takeTime (secs)

objtime.t[402]

Make the current action take secs time in total; this overrides any previously calcuated time for this action. [OBJTIME EXTENSION] Adv3Lite Library Reference Manual
